contents.name: README
contents.contents:
Hello, my name is Sunjay Dhama. I am studying Computer Science at Cal Poly San Luis Obispo. This is my website. You can find the source code to make your own here.

If you need help, type "help".

You can contact me at sdhama [at] calpoly [dot] edu.

contents.name: pic.jpg
contents.caption: It's me on a Google Bike!

contents.name: Github
contents.description: I have various projects hosted on my Github (including my senior project).

contents.name: Brawl
contents.description: The project for a team I led in my SE class. Download our game!

contents.name: SloMo
contents.description: A web app my team created during the Mindbody Hackathon.

contents.name: LinuxGuide
contents.description: A beginner's guide to Linux my team wrote.
